Behaviour Note (2025-12-04 06:32:00): Behaviour Displayed : Incident happened to the room 420 next to residents room. As per PSW 1:1 Blesson A. resident entered to the next room started screaming and came towards the 1;1 staff for 420-b resident and hit on the both hands particularly hard hit on his left hand while protecting himself. Resident Response : Resident is calm and sleeping at present. Behaviour Note (2025-12-02 00:02:00): Behaviour Displayed : Resident was sitting in the dinning room waiting for his food. When PSW cerfel wheeled other resident (J,R) into the next sit next to resident in table 13. Resident suddenly got up from his chairs and slapped resident (J,R) in her face twice on the left side. When writer asked resident what happened writer was unable to understand to due to language. Intervention : PSW cerfel immediately remove (J,R) from the dinning room. Charge nurse sarbjit was notified. Resident son Steve was called and was notified. Half a hour safety check initiated. BSO Kim was notified. Time, Frequency and # of Staff : 1640 hrs, Dinning room b table 13. PSW cerfel Pretencio, and PSW Mary Campos witnessed this incident. Evaluation of Intervention : Resident was told not to do this anymore and resident stated okay but writer was unable to tell if resident understood or not. There was no prior interaction or conflict with both of the resident. No injuries were noted. Resident was put on safety check to check his behaviour. Resident Response : Resident stated okay. Behaviour Note (2025-12-01 23:03:00): Behaviour Displayed : A behavioural huddle was completed with staff following an incident involving physical expression from the resident. She stated that she observed the resident stand up and, without warning, slap resident (JR) in the face. PSW Cerfel attempted to quickly move the other resident(JR) away from the situation when the resident slapped (JR) again on the opposite side of the face.PSW Cerfel reported there were no verbal aggressive behaviours or indicators prior to the incident and that the behaviour appeared to occur unexpectedly. Staff also stated that this is not the residentâ€™s baseline behaviour. Intervention : Residents were separated 30 min safety checks were initiated BSO-DOS was initiated Dec 2-Dec 6 email sent to FSM for possible table change. Behaviour Note (2025-12-01 21:40:00): Behaviour Displayed : Resident was being wheeled into the dining room from her room for supper at 1640hrs by psw Cerfel Pretencio. Resident was seated at her table #13, Resident that was sitting right next to her(P.K)suddenly got up and slapped her in the face (left side) without any provocation, there was no verbal altercation observed prior to the incident. Resident (p.k) offered no explanation when asked about his behavior. Intervention : Resident was immediately removed from dining room and brought into her room. Charge nurse was notified of incident. Resident son Frank was notified and was pleased to be informed and stated he will be in tomorrow to visit his mom. Head to toe completed with no injuries noted, Vitals taken and recorded. Pain assessment completed, resident denies pain, Meal was provided in room with supervision. Half hour safety checks initiated. Time, Frequency and # of Staff : 1640hrs, Table #13 Dining room B. No distress or physical injuries noted.
